story:
Safeto. . .  technology works to create safety nets for you and your loved ones, this technology enables you to have our profile searcher across your devices, searching the names and profiles of those you are talking to.

Do you want to know if the person you are chatting to online has been convicted of child molestation? How about if the daughters new boyfriend has a history of domestic violence? Does the tradesman dropping by have a criminal record? Your child's new online buddy, is there an ulterior motive behind them? We will help you to find these answers.

These checks are a background search on any person whom you interact with. All of our members can make unlimited searches. 

We at Safeto... don't just focus on Child Sex Offenders and Domestic Violence offences we also focus on offenders who have records for Fraud, Murder, Sex Offences, Serial Killers, Stalkers and an array of Internet Offences, we believe our systems are more superior because they work better, for the public's needs and the offender's, we are the only company that collate these offences for this specific outcome giving us the ability to have non intrusive public searching within the base and allowing you to search . . 


Emergencies can happen in many and varied forms

We believe having the technology at you fingertips to call for help, send location and emails to emergency contacts in times of a questionable interaction, incident or an accident, is crucial. We have added an emergency call and or email feature for your contacts.



A fast easy way to check on more personal interactions. . many criminals try to integrate back into our society without telling the whole truth of where and what there own background history is -

Safeto... never delete information or 'times out' offenders records. Most searches for offenders records online disappear after 3 months, and private searches are costly per 24 hour period and are not always guaranteed - no other company offers extensive all history inclusive searches unlimited for a fraction of cost.

A May 2015 report by the institute found parents were the third most frequent group of victims of family homicides, behind partners and children.


Between 2002-03 and 2011-12, 134 parents were murdered by their children — a crime known as parricide. Ten incidents resulted in the deaths of both parents. These children are released after a life sentence - generally around 25 years.

By way of comparison, 654 people were murdered by their domestic partner in the same period, and 238 children were killed by their parent or parents. There were 40 victims of sibling homicide between 2002 and 2012.


The dashboard is your home base at Safeto, complete with tips to keep safe on and off line. We have links for members in crisis, and we will run moderated forums and encourage all members to discuss many and varied topics. We will run our competitions through the home dashboard as well as any partnerships offering coupons, to help us encourage our members to meet in public areas. 


Through your input the app can check on the criminal status of those you meet and if you meet strangers on the way you can add them and also check real time if they are safe to travel with.

If for some reason you don't make it to the next arrival point our tools will alert you to check in 3 times before it emails or texts an emergency with a message of your choice.


Safeto... brings to you a world of security

We believe having closed databases and allowing individuals to make specific searches within it, looking for only people they personally have interactions with is the key to help maintain a nameless shameless and blameless society. 

Studies show that open registers can be more counter productive to society, and can cause offender's to re-offend with worse than before outcomes to enable longer jail terms. 


This is the same tool but used differently, using it this way enables our system to know where you are by using tracking by location and array of layered information that you enter and is then monitored by our systems. 




Use the same tool to help you arrange appointments that have multi contacts and have multi emails sent to individuals about those different meeting schedules and the outcomes.



Your itinerary buddy, safe arrival buddy and a link to loved ones in case of an emergency buddy. . . all in one.

 


Travel anywhere in the world and we will link you to your loved ones. We will also link you to the people you meet with and travel with all in the same tool.

For example your wife decides to go shopping while you go on a charter, you have access to live chat during your time apart, and you also have access to an emergency call to your partner and email duplicated to family in times of distress.

Last known location and time will be forwarded in times when an email has not been generated.

Safeto. . . are so proud of our tools you get them as a package Datebuddy, Profilebuddy and our Dashboard for all your profiles and ratings.


Online Visibility - our tick of approval

 The idea is to have every member tooled up with our apps and ready to help protect themselves on and offline, however it is also just as important that our members encourage others when they are online to be verified also, a member will have a visual tick on profiles that show others they are verified. 

A discreet logo on all the profiles you use, and encouraging others to verify themselves will help us make the internet safer to interact on, for everyone. 

Anyone displaying the logo would be able to be searched on profile buddy, this shows a searcher that this person has been a member at some point and if they are a paid member now.

 This helps us to link our profiles to a real person. If someone is online and not verified we would not encourage interactions.
story_txt:
Safeto. . .  technology works to create safety nets for you and your loved ones, this technology enables you to have our profile searcher across your devices, searching the names and profiles of those you are talking to.Do you want to know if the person you are chatting to online has been convicted of child molestation? How about if the daughters new boyfriend has a history of domestic violence? Does the tradesman dropping by have a criminal record? Your child's new online buddy, is there an ulterior motive behind them? We will help you to find these answers.These checks are a background search on any person whom you interact with. All of our members can make unlimited searches. We at Safeto... don't just focus on Child Sex Offenders and Domestic Violence offences we also focus on offenders who have records for Fraud, Murder, Sex Offences, Serial Killers, Stalkers and an array of Internet Offences, we believe our systems are more superior because they work better, for the public's needs and the offender's, we are the only company that collate these offences for this specific outcome giving us the ability to have non intrusive public searching within the base and allowing you to search . . Safeto. . . the only company striving to link real people to profiles and verify  them as safe, so you and your children can interact with safer connections online and in real time.Safeto. . . the only company striving to verify every business' on and offline, targeting those companies who deal with  real customers within there service's - the outcome is a verification that consumers deserve -  knowing the business' you deal with are working in the best interest for you and having that information at your fingertips in easy to see and understandable format is paramount.Simple colour coded results on any person and profile searched.

Profilebuddy and how this tool would have helped this situation.Recently in Australia, a Families SA employer was jailed for three decades, he worked with hundreds of children over a period of years and had molested, abused and filmed his atrocities that he inflicted upon his child victims.  Both colleagues and members of the public admitted to noticing that 'things weren't right' but had no way of acting upon a hunch. He was also a 'KING-PIN' and creator of a massive underworld global paedophile ring with hundreds of members swapping images.This is just one person that was trusted within our community - researching these issues for the past four years, we have collected over 350,000 convicted criminals, the majority of which were entrusted as teachers, sports coaches, taxi drivers, child care workers and even the tradesmen that you invite into your home.Another situation recently where Datebuddy would have helped.A man allegedly tried to kidnap and murder two female backpackers in South Australian bush land. Police found and arrested the 59-year-old man from Adelaide, about two hours north-east from the site of the alleged attempted kidnapping. We also encourage our community to report incidents as we believe the key is within the small things. 

More Australians than ever are falling victim to identity crime and the victims aren’t signing up to dodgy scams or being careless either. Safeto. . . helps you interact with others safely and be safe to interact with on and off line.Our unique verification system will reduce these devastating statistics.
While children are hiding this from their parents, who do they turn to if they encounter a paedophile or stalker? Where can they report that incident without being 'told off'?

"In Australia there were 3600 Paedophile profiler's procuring kids online over 90 days from one state alone." 
These children are being HUNTED, by people who can amass hundreds and thousands of aliases and be totally anonymous - UNTIL NOW!




SEXUAL assaults and related offences committed by school-aged children have almost quadrupled in four years.
Australian Bureau of Statistics figures show that between 2007 and 2011 the number of offences jumped from 430 to 1709 across the nation. 
Experts believe the greater and easier access children now have to pornographic material via the internet is playing a role in the worrying trend.
The ABS figures also showed a near 100 per cent jump in school-aged children committing acts intended to cause injury between 2007 and 2011 - from 5621 to 11,085.




In 2012 almost 30,000 more criminal offences were committed in Victoria, with massive hikes in drug offences, family violence and assaults, statistics show.
Drug offences jumped a worrying 20.7 per cent, assaults have shot up by 14.2 per cent, family violence skyrocketed 37 per cent, and overall crimes have risen 11.3 per cent.
A simple verification system, ran for the safety of the public, by the public.


WE BELIEVE PREVENTION IS BETTER THAN CURE.
We are a dedicated group of passionate people, and have been working on our system (and your safety) for over 4 years. In this time we have seen growth and opportunity, pushing the project from being a useful tool in the online dating game to helping parents try to get a handle of children online gaming and interacting online with an array of unknown's in chat rooms and forums - to now being a  much sought after requirement for real time interactions off line also with hundreds of scenario's that it can be used for including never before real-time instant verification.



Imagine if all it took was a glance whilst your child's gaming online with 'friends' to see that they are visibly verified!  We are creating THE universal online identity mark. 
We believe we have the key, but not just for our mission


The Office of Police Integrity wants Vic Police stripped of data control
They were accused of recording crimes as cleared
But up to 15000 per year were actually unsolved

The director of OPI said "the situation was so bad that consideration should be given to creating a new body "external to and independent of Victoria Police to compile, analyse and publish crime statistics".





Imagine if we also made a tool that you could enter a future meeting, trip away or date that included:




We did. . .  and we integrated even more safety features for you! 
Emergencies can happen in many and varied formsWe believe having the technology at you fingertips to call for help, send location and emails to emergency contacts in times of a questionable interaction, incident or an accident, is crucial. We have added an emergency call and or email feature for your contacts.A fast easy way to check on more personal interactions. . many criminals try to integrate back into our society without telling the whole truth of where and what there own background history is -Safeto... never delete information or 'times out' offenders records. Most searches for offenders records online disappear after 3 months, and private searches are costly per 24 hour period and are not always guaranteed - no other company offers extensive all history inclusive searches unlimited for a fraction of cost.A May 2015 report by the institute found parents were the third most frequent group of victims of family homicides, behind partners and children.Between 2002-03 and 2011-12, 134 parents were murdered by their children — a crime known as parricide. Ten incidents resulted in the deaths of both parents. These children are released after a life sentence - generally around 25 years.By way of comparison, 654 people were murdered by their domestic partner in the same period, and 238 children were killed by their parent or parents. There were 40 victims of sibling homicide between 2002 and 2012.The dashboard is your home base at Safeto, complete with tips to keep safe on and off line. We have links for members in crisis, and we will run moderated forums and encourage all members to discuss many and varied topics. We will run our competitions through the home dashboard as well as any partnerships offering coupons, to help us encourage our members to meet in public areas. 



Through your input the app can check on the criminal status of those you meet and if you meet strangers on the way you can add them and also check real time if they are safe to travel with.
If for some reason you don't make it to the next arrival point our tools will alert you to check in 3 times before it emails or texts an emergency with a message of your choice.

Safeto... brings to you a world of security
We believe having closed databases and allowing individuals to make specific searches within it, looking for only people they personally have interactions with is the key to help maintain a nameless shameless and blameless society. 
Studies show that open registers can be more counter productive to society, and can cause offender's to re-offend with worse than before outcomes to enable longer jail terms. 

 

If you have experienced something on or offline - share it with us so we can help the next person who interacts with them.











This is the same tool but used differently, using it this way enables our system to know where you are by using tracking by location and array of layered information that you enter and is then monitored by our systems. 


Use the same tool to help you arrange appointments that have multi contacts and have multi emails sent to individuals about those different meeting schedules and the outcomes.



Your itinerary buddy, safe arrival buddy and a link to loved ones in case of an emergency buddy. . . all in one.
 



Travel anywhere in the world and we will link you to your loved ones. We will also link you to the people you meet with and travel with all in the same tool.
For example your wife decides to go shopping while you go on a charter, you have access to live chat during your time apart, and you also have access to an emergency call to your partner and email duplicated to family in times of distress.
Last known location and time will be forwarded in times when an email has not been generated.


Safeto. . . are so proud of our tools you get them as a package Datebuddy, Profilebuddy and our Dashboard for all your profiles and ratings.

 

Online Visibility - our tick of approval
 The idea is to have every member tooled up with our apps and ready to help protect themselves on and offline, however it is also just as important that our members encourage others when they are online to be verified also, a member will have a visual tick on profiles that show others they are verified. 
A discreet logo on all the profiles you use, and encouraging others to verify themselves will help us make the internet safer to interact on, for everyone. 
Anyone displaying the logo would be able to be searched on profile buddy, this shows a searcher that this person has been a member at some point and if they are a paid member now.
 This helps us to link our profiles to a real person. If someone is online and not verified we would not encourage interactions. 




Imagine if you didn't have to carry or scan personal documents anymore!



We are listening to industry concerns and offer company/ corporate packages for searching instead of requesting costly criminal reports - it's ideal for fast checks on multiple potential employees and sub-contractors on the spot.
Our vision is to link companies to you, so instead of always verifying yourself to some companies and governmental agencies, they will be able to verify themselves to you, one link. 



Safeto. . makes the links, for you

story:
In Limbo, A Horror Film.


The Story.

 ‘’In an abandoned hotel a psychology student encounters with the restless spirits of forgotten children, leads her to discover her own family’s hidden secrets.’’

The film follows the story of Victoria  student of psychology studying at the world famous Koestler Institute at Edinburgh University. During a summer break Victoria and two friends decide to visit a now deserted hotel in the foothills of the Peak District. It is near here that a number of sightings of Black Eyed Children have recently been reported by locals. Who are the Black Eyed Children, and why are they suddenly revealing themselves now? What do they want and how are they linked to Victoria and her families past?

The film is the first feature film by first time director Stuart Wheeldon, Stuart is based in the Derbyshire town of Wirksworth; his previous work includes a number of short films and plays which have been produced in the UK and in Europe.

The film itself is influenced by the famous Cannock Chase sightings of Black Eyed Children, these were recently reported in numerous national newspapers and local press.

What We Need & What You Get

Like all Independent films we require some sort of funding. We have tried to keep this down the the minimum required. No one on the film is working for payment, all of the money raised will be used towards the following items.

Insurance-This is essential, this covers not only the actors but also the equipment we are using and the public.

Equipment-Hire of camera and lenses (Alexi 6k), Steadicam hire, Dolly and tracking, lighting and sound equipment.

Costume/Makeup and Art Direction. We have some fabulous exterior locations in the Derbyshire Dales, and also some wonderful interior locations, but we will still need to dress them appropriately, this is essential alongside the costume and the makeup for the Mise En Scene of the film.

Expenses. This area covers everything from accommodating a small crew and cast, food, travel costs and any location fees.

You will find a variation of perks we have to offer, these vary accordingly to donation pledges.

Cast And Crew

We are extremely lucky to have both experienced crew and cast involved in the project, here is a little more about the people involved.

Stuart Wheeldon.(Director/Writer/Producer) Stuart has been writing for the last twenty years, he started his career in theatre, running his own theatre company and touring around the UK. He went on to study film and since then as made a number of short films which have taken him to Europe and the UK. He also worked on the development of a documentary series for television and is in development with a second feature film and short film which he hopes will be ready for 2016.

Geraint Owen. (Director of Photography). Geraint has worked in television and film for the last fifteen years, he has worked on a number of successful television projects as camera operator, focus puller and assistant. www.imdb.com/name/nm3550897/

Bern Deegan (Actor) 

Bern was cast in the lead role of 'Peter Nash' in Big Ideas Films Feature Film 'POINT OF NO RETURN' which also stars Paul Ronan, Don Wycherley and Steven Berkoff. The film was Directed by Kevin Glynn and is currently in post production. The first half of 2014 saw Bern on national tour playing the title role in "SETANTA" for Clan Cluana Theatre Company. www.imdb.com/name/nm1117874/

Rebekah Bowman (Actor)

Rebekah Bowman is an actress, known for The Last of Her Blood (2015), The Girl with Branches in Her Hair (2014), she recently finished filming a new television series entitled 'Hood' www.imdb.com/name/nm4296075/

Matthew Strachan. (Composer)

Matthew Strachan has composed music for film, TV, and stage, and written songs for Nashville and for musical theatre. His music can currently be heard on BBC Radio 4's landmark WWI drama HOME FRONT. He has recently completed scores for AS IS at the Finborough Theatre and PASSING BY at the Tristan Bates Theatre and his third musical, ﻿ABOUT BILL﻿, premièred in London in 2011. Matthew is also the creator of the celebrated Klaus Harmony and the fictional horror composer Bertók Freítgeísz.

Matthew's film and TV credits include MONEY (BBC), SLUMDOG MILLIONAIRE (Fox Searchlight), EXTRACT (Miramax), ABOUT A BOY (Universal Pictures), A KIND OF HUSH (First Film Company), WINNING LINES (Worldwide), QUESTION TIME (BBC), THE WARD (ITV), THE DETECTIVES (BBC), and BOOGIE OUTLAWS (BBC).

Matthew has won twelve awards including the ASCAP Hall of Fame Award for the soundtrack to WHO WANTS TO BE A MILLIONAIRE? www.imdb.com/name/nm0833059/

We also have a number of other talented individuals working on the film, these are currently still being confirmed, but once this is the case we will update and let you know.

We are already fortunate enough to have secured release of the film both locally and internationally. We are also exploring distribution through online and DVD sales.


Risks & Challenges

We have enough combined experience to feel comfortable in saying that we will be able to handle any difficulties or challenges that arise. We are going into this very well-prepared and very knowledgeable about what it takes to make a movie. 

Other Ways You Can Help

BECOME OUR SOCIAL NETWORKERS//

Even if you can't support us by giving us money, you can still help us by becoming one of our social network warriors! We need as much exposure as we can get for our campaign to work, and we need YOU to retweet, regram, re-post, check-in, share, blog, tag, pin, link, subscribe, follow...... stalk.....

INVEST IN IN LIMBO

If you would like to invest in IN LIMBO and see a return on your investment, we are offering 50% of the film to private investors. To be among them, please contact us on stuart@inlimbofeaturefilm.com

FINALLY ONE BIG FAT THANK YOU IN ADVANCE FROM ALL OF US!!  

You can follow our film at www.inlimbofeaturefilm.com

http://www.imdb.com/title/tt4579258/?ref_=fn_al_tt_2


We thank you for your time.

story:
If you were forced to choose between your faith or your life, what would you do?  That is the very choice that some are forced to make. 

Every day NGOs, citizen lead non government organizations, fight to end religious persecution around the world.  We want to tell their story.  

This is an amazing Christian story that must be told, truthfully and the Christian way!  We know that if Hollywood makes this story will be made completely politically correct, Christianity will be watered down, and Sharia Law will be protected. 

In today's world, where Christians are openly mocked by the main stream media, you now have a chance to stand and bravely declare "I Am A Christian!" This is an opportunity for you to become a valuable “crew member” in the creation a major feature film, one that will be unashamed to tell the complete truth of persecuted Christian's experiences. Every contribution to this Indiegogo campaign, no matter the amount, helps to ensure that this movie will be told honestly and without regard to political correctness! 

In return, we would like to give something back.  Although we cannot predict the financial outcome of this film, history has shown that “small” Christian movies can make large returns at the box office!  For example, Fireproof was shot with a budget of just half-a-million dollars, yet it had a box office gross of over 33 million!  God’s Not Dead was made for only 2 million, yet it made over 63 million at the box office!  We believe that I Am A Christian has the potential to do just as well, but our unique difference is that 50% of the film’s gross earnings will be donated to Judeo/Christian charities working to fight religious persecution worldwide. We dare any Hollywood studio to make the same offer to give away half of its revenues on any one of its films.  The truth is that would never happen. 

This is your chance to make your voice heard!  Let the world know that Christian lives matter!  Help to spread the word by picking a donation level that you are comfortable with, whether it is a thousand dollars or five dollars, and support this worthy project today. 

Stand up with your support and declare, Yes, I Am A Christian!  Thank you, and God bless.

story:
Who I am and a little about my project:

  • Hello my name is Eddie Yzaguirre.  I am a graduate student at The University of Texas at Dallas (UTD).  I am currently in the MFA program and will be finishing this spring.  
  • I currently work as a the head editor for UTDTV and have been involved with filmmaking as long as I can remember.  
  • The main story: A young woman escapes from a medical facility and finds out she has been experimented on.  She discovers she can use different pitches of sound as a weapon.  These abilities come with a horrible price and force her to question who can be trusted.  


Why I would appreciate your support:

  • By helping me fund this project, I want this to be a stepping stone for me to start work on making my own films.  For too long I have been working for others and I want to demonstrate to the world I have ideas and concepts that are creative and original.  
  • I am needing money to cover expenses (Actors/crew/camera and lighting equipment/food/costumes/set locations/special effects/gas money/etc.) for filming my thesis project. 

The Impact

  • While this project is pure fiction (science fiction), the topics addressed will be illegal immigration, human experiments, and drug abuse .
  • The underlining theme is taking control of your life after dealing with tragedy.     

Risks & Challenges

  • Any problems I come across I can handle.  I have learned life throws you challenges which cause you to learn and overcome.    
  • I am working with friends and students (many like me are college students)  who are graciously devoting their time and energy into my thesis.   

Finally:

  • I would appreciate any money that is offered.  If you aren't able to donate money, then I would really appreciate it if you could let others be aware of my project.

story:
Short Summary

  • Matthew 28:18-20 And Jesus came and spoke to them, saying, “All authority has been given to Me in heaven and on earth. Go therefore and make disciples of all the nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, teaching them to observe all things that I have commanded you; and lo, I am with you always, even to the end of the age.” Amen.

  • Welcome to this page! I hope you will discern that the making of this documentary is a GOD idea, not just a good idea! Also, I hope you will consider partnering with me to share the love of God, and the Gospel of our Lord Jesus Christ through my Christian documentary, by making a donation, from $1 upwards. Nothing is too small, no amount is too insignificant in our Lord's hands, and every seed you sow will surely prosper and further God's Kingdom on earth. My name is Jolomi Karlsson and I am eager to share the Good News of Christ through film and the media. I hold a Bachelor's Degree in Theology from the University of Cambridge, England, and completed Post Graduate Studies in Education, also at Cambridge University. Furthermore, I completed a screenwriting course from UCLA.  I am a naturalized US citizen, and am co-producing this film with a Regional Film Board in Sweden called 'Film i Värmland,' although I am the majority owner. I am interested in raising further funds through crowdfunding as I wish to maintain creative control over the project so that the Christian aspect of it will not be watered down or compromised, which can sometimes be the case when there is too much secular financing. 
  • My campaign is hugely important to me in that the Christian faith, and the message of the Gospel is my passion. It has been my passion since I became saved over 19 years ago. At the time I came to faith in Christ, I had barely ever heard the expression 'to be saved' and the experience took me by surprise, as it happened in our house in Sweden, literally on the staircase as I was going up the stairs oneday! This documentary is important as I believe that the media will prove one of the key methods by which the Lord will spread the message of His Son in these last days. I am extremely keen to see the production of quality Christian films and documentaries, especially ones made by Christians who understand what a Christian worldview is! One of my primary objectives is to make God's role in History known, emphasised and appreciated, as it is so often obscured and downplayed in contemporary documentaries, and historical films. 
  • I will need about 20,000 USD to complete my documentary, which has been in the making since 2010. Over the years, I have already personally invested a significant sum in the making of this documentary. The documentary will be a long feature documentary film of approximately 72 minutes for theaters (cinemas). In addition, as a teacher qualified in the UK, and as a former national examiner for schools in Religious Studies for GCSEs and A Levels in the UK, I can confirm that the film will be highly useful as an educational resource for schools, and colleges, especially for social sciences, law and UK subjects such as RE and RS, as it deals with the issue of faith within the context of contemporary and social issues.  
  • The film is set in three different locations: Sweden, Texas, USA, and Cambridge, England. I have already filmed in Houston, Texas, and have already obtained an excellent interview with a former warden of Death Row, a Christian, who, in a graphic way, explains how many Death Row inmates turn to faith in Christ and how their new-found faith sustains them knowing that they know the exact time and date of their deaths! The former warden also explains how he, and the other staff members survived and coped with a job which involved confronting death on a daily basis, and how their Christian faith proved to be a huge help. I will also film in Sweden, notably in and around our house, in a hamlet here called Södra Ström, where I personally came to faith in Christ, (as I mentioned above, it happened on the staircase in the house). Lastly, I will film and and interview key people in Cambridge, England,  (where I grew up) if possible at Cambridge University Teaching Hospital, (Addenbrookes Hospital) where I was forced to personally confront the issue of death through cancer. A significant amount of the funding will go towards post-production activities such as editing, a crucial part of the film process. 
  • TOGETHER, with YOUR contribution, we can fulfil the Great Commission through filmmaking! 

  • Proverbs 3:9-10 '…Honor the LORD from your wealth And from the first of all your produce; So your barns will be filled with plenty And your vats will overflow with new wine.'

    Joel 2:23-25 'So rejoice, O sons of Zion, And be glad in the LORD your God; For He has given you the early rain for your vindication. And He has poured down for you the rain, The early and latter rain as before. 24The threshing floors will be full of grain, And the vats will overflow with the new wine and oil.25"Then I will make up to you for the years That the swarming locust has eaten, The creeping locust, the stripping locust and the gnawing locust, My great army which I sent among you.'

I hold a Bachelor's Degree in Theology from the University of Cambridge, England, and completed Post Graduate Studies in Education, also at Cambridge University. Furthermore, I completed a screenwriting course from UCLA.  I am a naturalized US citizen, and am co-producing this film with a Regional Film Board in Sweden called 'Film i Värmland,' although I am the majority owner. I am interested in raising further funds through crowdfunding as I wish to maintain creative control over the project so that the Christian aspect of it will not be watered down or compromised, which can sometimes be the case when there is too much secular financing.  My campaign is hugely important to me in that the Christian faith, and the message of the Gospel is my passion. It has been my passion since I became saved over 19 years ago. At the time I came to faith in Christ, I had barely ever heard the expression 'to be saved' and the experience took me by surprise, as it happened in our house in Sweden, literally on the staircase as I was going up the stairs oneday! This documentary is important as I believe that the media will prove one of the key methods by which the Lord will spread the message of His Son in these last days. I am extremely keen to see the production of quality Christian films and documentaries, especially ones made by Christians who understand what a Christian worldview is! One of my primary objectives is to make God's role in History known, emphasised and appreciated, as it is so often obscured and downplayed in contemporary documentaries, and historical films. 

  I will need about 20,000 USD to complete my documentary, which has been in the making since 2010. Over the years, I have already personally invested a significant sum in the making of this documentary. The documentary will be a long feature documentary film of approximately 72 minutes for theaters (cinemas). In addition, as a teacher qualified in the UK, and as a former national examiner for schools in Religious Studies for GCSEs and A Levels in the UK, I can confirm that the film will be highly useful as an educational resource for schools, and colleges, especially for social sciences, law and UK subjects such as RE and RS, as it deals with the issue of faith within the context of contemporary and social issues.  
The film is set in three different locations: Sweden, Texas, USA, and Cambridge, England. I have already filmed in Houston, Texas, and have already obtained an excellent interview with a former warden of Death Row, a Christian, who, in a graphic way, explains how many Death Row inmates turn to faith in Christ and how their new-found faith sustains them knowing that they know the exact time and date of their deaths! The former warden also explains how he, and the other staff members survived and coped with a job which involved confronting death on a daily basis, and how their Christian faith proved to be a huge help. I will also film in Sweden, notably in and around our house, in a hamlet here called Södra Ström, where I personally came to faith in Christ, (as I mentioned above, it happened on the staircase in the house). Lastly, I will film and and interview key people in Cambridge, England,  (where I grew up) if possible at Cambridge University Teaching Hospital, (Addenbrookes Hospital) where I was forced to personally confront the issue of death through cancer. A significant amount of the funding will go towards post-production activities such as editing, a crucial part of the film process. 
TOGETHER, with YOUR contribution, we can fulfil the Great Commission through filmmaking! 

Proverbs 3:9-10 '…Honor the LORD from your wealth And from the first of all your produce; So your barns will be filled with plenty And your vats will overflow with new wine.'
Joel 2:23-25 'So rejoice, O sons of Zion, And be glad in the LORD your God; For He has given you the early rain for your vindication. And He has poured down for you the rain, The early and latter rain as before. 24The threshing floors will be full of grain, And the vats will overflow with the new wine and oil.25"Then I will make up to you for the years That the swarming locust has eaten, The creeping locust, the stripping locust and the gnawing locust, My great army which I sent among you.'

story:
Short Summary

**UPDATE** Many thanks to our new sponsor. The next film will be presented by Race Flow Development.

Hi, my name is Jay Davies and I am the video guy for Red Victor Racing: a drag racing team from Wolverhampton, England. 

For the past couple of years I have followed the story of Red Victor 3 in its quest to become the fastest street legal car in the world.

In 2013 I made a film (shown above) called Red Victor 3 - The World's Fastest Street Legal Car.  It followed the team during their world record breaking season, when Andy extended his record 3 times in the same season. 

The 50-minute feature showcases the hard-work, determination, time and skill that went into achieving the life-long dream of owner and driver; Andy Frost.


The Story

Now, this is where our second film begins.  In 2014 Andy Frost's incredible world record of 6.40 seconds was smashed twice by American driver; Larry Larson, who out-ran Red Victor 3 in his modified Chevy pickup by 0.24 seconds.  A few weeks later Larson lowered that record even further by running an incredible 5.95 seconds at 244mph - making it a world's first.



5 seconds in a street car was previously unthinkable and is a remarkable achievement for Larson and his racing team.  Now, obviously Andy was not going to take this one lying down but it was going to cost him a lot of money and time to get RV3 running into the 5s.  It seemed impossible.  And for a while the future of Red Victor 3 looked bleak.

What happened next is nothing short of a miracle: a fan set up a secret Facebook page to raise funds for the work that was going to be needed to get Andy Frost's  Vauxhall Victor ready to take on Larry Larson’s Chevy truck.  The response was overwhelming.  In just a few weeks hundreds of fans donated and raised the money needed to get RV3 back in the game. 

So, what next?  

Our next film will document Red Victor's come back.  Long-time rivals Frost and Larson will battle it out to  see who really can drive the fastest down the quarter-mile.  A story of national pride, deep rivalry, high speeds and spiralling costs, can our man Andy reclaim his title?


What We Need & What You Get

By pledging funds you will be helping to make this film happen.  I make these films because I admire Andy Frost and his story.  No one is paid and it is a group effort.  Making films is also very time consuming, with the first taking around 2 full months to edit and produce.  But this is a story that should be told and I really hope you agree. 

The money would go towards camera and audio equipment,fuel, general running costs, and supplies.I will also be able to maintain my 1984 Dodge Day-van which is used as filming HQ, living and sleeping accommodation while on location.  


Anything beyond our goal would be truly incredible and would mean we'd be able to carry on making videos in the future.

As soon as the target is reached, I will head to Penn Autos (the home of Red Victor 3) and start filming - ideally by end of Feb 2015.  During filming I will edit and upload mini episodes capturing the rebuilding of the car, engine fitting, tuning and the run-up to RV3's new world record attempts.



The next films look

I am hoping to achieve a more cinematic look and style in this next film, similar to this one below that I shot on location at Santa Pod several years ago: 'Combustion'.



Risks & Challenges

As fans of drag racing you probably know that events dictate the story so filming may not run as smoothly as we'd like - estimates on when a full-length feature will be ready is up in the air.  Hopefully, the car will run sweet and the sun will shine... either way I will be uploading footage of any progress (good or bad) that is sure to make good viewing!

Other Ways You Can Help

Any business that would like to sponsor the film and search for speed would also be very welcome.

If you can't donate then you can help us by spreading the word on social media sites such as, Facebook, twitter, Instagram etc.

To donate to the race team (not the film) please email redvictor1@hotmail.com

story:
The Concept

"Handi-Capable" will be the newest entry in the long line of talent/reality programming that has become so prevalent on cable television, but with a difference all its own: all of the contestants will themselves be Handi-Capable, which means that each of them have some form of disability.  "Handi-Capable," as the title of the show, refers to the fact that a disability is really nothing but a difference, and certainly does not detract from the individual talents and gifts that we all have.

While this will be a Magic Mirror Production, we are working together with others in the entertainment industry who feel as we do, that a disability or impairment should NOT be a factor in the decision to accept or reject a new performer. We are excited to have the support of Grammy Winning Song Writer and Producer Gary S. Paxton, Sr.,who has been working for years towards a goal of a music school specifically for children with disabilities, and of Ronnie Hurst of BreakThru Entertainment, a talent agency that specializes in the representation of Handi-Capable artists.

Mr. Paxton's commitment stems from a bout with spinal meningitis that he suffered as a child, which left him with limited control over his body and caused people to reject him as a performer until he hit upon the notion of using his jerky movements to create a whole new style of performance guitar. He was so successful that he became known as the "Elvis of Tucson," and guitar players have been imitating him ever since! His enthusiasm and energy are what made him a star, and can be felt in the theme song that he has written and provided for this program.

Mr. Hurst found his own interest when a recording of one of his songs was sent to a major record producer in Nashville, who instantly expressed interest. However, when they were shown a photograph of him, and realized that he was born with no arms and only one leg, they immediately rescinded their offer of a recording contract, claiming that due to his condition and appearance, he was simply not marketable. The pain of this rejection led him to create his agency, BreakThru Entertainment, with the intent of representing artists with disabilities.


The Program

"Handi-Capable" will be a web-based television program, formatted like most other talent programs, with contestants gathered to a central location where they are coached, encouraged and mentored to help them give the best performance they can. Contestants will perform as musicians, singers, dancers, comics and actors, and there may be special categories, as well.

In each weeks episode, some contestants will be voted off and will return home, while others will move on toward the grand prize which, as with most such programs, will include  a valuable promotion and management package with Magic Mirror and a touring schedule. All of the top twelve contestants will share in these prizes, though the first place winner will receive the lion's share.

The Plan

There will be celebrity judges on the panel, including Mr. Paxton, Mr. Hurst and others. Currently the leading candidate for Hostess of the program is Rachael Burns, who is the current Miss Texas International. Ms. Burns would be exceptional in this position, since she herself has suffered severe hearing loss and therefore knows firsthand the stigma that is attached to even the slightest type of challenge.

We currently plan to hold auditions in late spring/early summer, in the following twelve cities:

  1. Dallas/Fort Worth, Texas
  2. Orlando, Florida
  3. Atlanta, Georgia
  4. Knoxville, Tennessee
  5. Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania
  6. Chicago, Illinois
  7. Kansas City, Kansas
  8. Salt Lake City, Utah
  9. Portland, Oregon
  10. Los Angeles, California
  11. Tuscon, Arizona
  12. Branson, Missouri

From the contestants selected during the auditions, the judges will choose the top 120 and begin the winnowing process that will, unfortunately send some contestants home and give us the top twenty contestants, from which the viewers will vote for the winners. The voting will take place directly on our website, and results announced during live taping of the results episode each week.

The Auditions Tour will begin in early April, and we'll announce the schedule and venues as soon as we have them committed. Then the actual competition will begin in the beginning of August, and will end with the final winner on Christmas Day of 2015.


What We Need & What You Get

Here's what we need to accomplish:

  • Location: We'll be taping in and around the Entertainment town of Branson, Missouri, and there are some wonderful theaters available to us there. By the time our auditions are complete, we should have some idea of how large our audiences will be, and can determine the size theater we will need. This means we'll need to make deposits to the theater management, utility companies and concessions providers.
  • Auditions: We'll be traveling to the cities listed above for the auditions, and we hope to be able to see everyone who might be interested in trying out for the show. This will require a bus for travel, hotel rooms for our auditions panel and crew, and the costs associated with being away from home for an extended period of time. Auditions will be taped and streamed as we move from city to city.
  • Marketing: We're planning a pretty comprehensive online ad campaign, using flash animation and a massive press release campaign to catch a lot of attention.  By promoting the program heavily, we believe we can capture a very large audience and make the program both a moral and financial success, leading to the additional successes of other programs and movies we're planning, as well.
  • Staff Payroll: We're going to need a number of staff on board during production, including camera operators, video editors, stage hands, grips, makeup artists and more. 
And here's what we have to offer in return for your support:
  • Contribute $5 and you'll have our sincerest appreciation!
  • Contribute $10 and we'll send you a print of our logo, autographed by our production team.
  • Contribute $20 and we'll send you a T-Shirt that identifies you as a Handi-Capable Supporter!
  • Contribute $50 and we'll list you as an Assistant Producer of the program.
  • Contribute $100 and you'll be listed as an Associate Producer of the show.
  • Contribute $500 and we'll send you four tickets to attend a taping in our theater.
  • Contribute $1000 and we'll send you four tickets to our taping, plus a three day, two night vacation package in Branson with  hotel and tickets to another show of your choice.
  • Contribute $2500 and receive a 5 day, 4 night vacation in Branson that you can use anytime this year, including hotel accommodations and tickets to four shows of your choice (list of shows provided)!
  • Contribute $5000 and you can be a guest Host or.Hostess for one episode.
  • Contribute $10000 and you can be a guest judge one one episode.

The Impact

One of the most important goals we have for this program at Magic Mirror Productions is to make sure that people with disabilities know that their value as human beings is not diminished! Everyone has a gift, and we hope that this program will help many people to put their own gifts to use, and encourage many more to find their gift and exercise it so that they can use it to bless others.

By helping us to make this program a reality, you'll be extending a hand of love and help to so many people who may be feeling as if they don't have a place in this world. This is a worthy thing to do, and we hope you'll help us to extend our own hands this way.

Other Ways You Can Help

We understand that some folks might want to help, but just can't contribute anything, and we appreciate your moral support in any case. But you can still help by getting the word out. Use the sharing tools to tell all your friends about us, post on your own social media sites. Any exposure we get might be the bit that helps us succeed!

story:
THE PITCH
This is a music video about Kyle, an offbeat, incomplete writer who generates characters that are extensions of his personality. They come to life and chase him into  an underground tunnel inhabited by his overindulgent desires. He encounters:
- Gluttony: Cake-slamming ballerinas
- Curiosity: Intrigued laser gazers
- Power: Cutthroat businessmen fighting for the top
- Lust: Overpowering, seductive dancers
All the characters lead him down a beam where he conquers independence: he takes objects from each desire, throws them on the ground, and steps over their remnants. The dancers lead him to a mirror- a doorway where he sees himself. He walks through to the other side a new man.

WHY ARE WE DOING THIS?
To collaborate with experimental artists to produce a single vision. We are a student community of music composers, filmmakers, dancers and choreographers, laser artists, actors, and visual effects specialists.
We want to feature Kyle Crawford's work as a composer:
https://soundcloud.com/tr1ptophan/quench-music-...

A BRIEF HISTORY
After listening to one of Kyle Crawford's songs, Nicole and Josh decided to produce a music video featuring his song "Quench" - the 'B' Side to his song "Thirst". They immediately started brainstorming about the story, and they began combining ideas with other student artists.

THE INDIEGOGO CREW
Producer: Nicole Holmes
Co-Producer: Josh Campbell
Associate Producer: Jacob Kimmick
Unit Production Manager: Ethan Bergeron
Production Coordinator: Claire Lebigot

Director: Nicole Holmes
1st Assistant Director: Jacob Kimmick
Choreographer: Megan Sarbaugh
Composer: Kyle Crawford
Publicist: Mike Gretzinger

Director of Photography: Josh Campbell
Camera Operator: Courtney Schehl
1st Assistant Camera: Chrissy Britt
2nd Assistant Camera: Claire Lebigot
Gaffers: Madisson Dashiell, Adam Lutge
Key Grip/Dolly Grip: Zemaya Ficklin

Recordist/Mixer/Boom Operator: Eduardo Céron

Editor: Kyle Crawford
DIT: Lily Williams

story:
Short Summary

Only 6 days left to contribute to Out of State A Gothic Romance Campaign.

I'm Victoria Bugbee, director, writer and producer of the new feature film "Out of State - A Gothic Romance."  Think "Rebecca" meets "The Royal Tenebaums" dark with a dash of humor.  We have shot over 60% of the film and we are thrilled with it.  The cast is fantastic and is nailing every scene.   We need your support to continue and finish production.  We have the big scenes left that require crewing up for two cameras, lots of extras and many days of production.  Then there is post production.  Whatever you contribute is greatly appreciated and we'll support your future projects.

 Here is a link to the trailer: https://vimeo.com/165040616

Here is a link to music video written by Joe Deihl and me.  Singer is Aimee Becker.  https://vimeo.com/138271583

SYNOPSIS

Beautiful 18 year old ELSA is in her senior year of high school. The recent death of her mother has darkened Elsa's usually bright persona.  When her step father has to go to the Middle East,  Elsa is sent to live with her quirky step-relatives who live in their own world.  MARCIA GARTH is a widow who treats her 20 something sons, EMERY and TAB, like 10 year old boys.  She is a failed musician who has nurtured Tab's musical talent and they dream of touring the world.  Emery is salt of the earth, the Cinderella of the family, who keeps the old house functioning and restores antiques to bring in money.  

Marcia ridicules Elsa's behavior and modern ways.  Gradually, Elsa befriends the two brothers and they fall madly in love with her - thus shattering Marcia's perfect triangle.  Will Marcia's tyrannical grip on her "boys" destroy budding young love?  Stay tuned and find out.

Set in the mid 1990's, our fantastic ensemble stars Sarah Moliski @sarahmoliski as "Elsa," Caroline Winterson as "Marcia Garth," James Nester  as"Tab Garth," Avery Ryder Turner as "Emery Garth," Tess Warren as "Becky,"  Matthew Brueckner as "Roy," Dave Shaeffler as "The Baker," and Lynne Goldberg as "Ms. Heller."

WHO WE ARE

I am an award winning playwright (NFYA) and have been involved in theater, film and video for the past 25 years.  "Out of State" was written a while ago with my distant cousin Charles Bugbee.  Charlie's film "Just Off the Coast" had just won Best First Feature at San Sebastian Film Festival and I had just written, directed and produced "A Surreal Soap Opera - Toxic Waste Meets Beach Resort" commissioned by Creative Time and Lincoln Center Out of Doors. 

http://www,victoriabugbee.com

Charlie went out to LA to find funding to produce "Out of State" and was taken ill.  We never had the opportunity to bring our creation to screen.  In Charlie's memory and with the blessing of his estate, we are shooting the feature in my old Victorian home in Hastings on Hudson, NY.

Producer Cherie Fortis is known for her work on Saturday Night Live, and independent projects for HBO, Showtime, PBS and Sundance Film Festival.  Award-winning projects include Anna Deavere Smith's "Twilight: Los Angeles" and "Fires in the Mirror," George C. Wolfe's "The Colored Museum," Spike Lee's "Do It A Capella, Whoopi Goldberg's "Direct from Broadway,"  and best musical documentary Paul Simon's "Graceland: The African Concert."  We worked together on a documentary "Crobar - The Making of a MegaClub" and live audience interactive performances of my play "The Gas Station Project." http://www.imdb.com/name/nm0287346/    

Cinematographer Ilya Shnitser and I worked together at B Productions on a number of fashion videos and I love his sensibility. http://www.imdb.com/name/nm5430075/ 

Costume Designer Kim Druce who worked on "The Sopranos," "KIDS," "Dead Man Walking," "A League of Their Own," and "Bullets Over Broadway." http://www.imdb.com/name/nm0238459/

Film composer Joe Deihl is on board to write original music and sound design.  Joe wrote the theme song for "Out of State - A Gothic Romance." We've worked together on my original musical "Life and Death With Business In Between," and "A Surreal Soap Opera."  He's written music and edited audio for many award winning docs and TV specials including "Blue Like Jazz" "Memories After Belsen," and "How to Lose Your Virginity." http://www.imdb.com/name/nm1384697/

Editor Jason Kessler has joined on to cut the feature.  An award winning editor, he edited the highly acclaimed documentary by Jessica Gerlach "Small, Small Thing,"  His original films include "Opposable Chums:Guts and Glory at The World Series of Birding," and "A Thief Among The Angels." We worked together on many fashion, beauty and lifestyle videos at B Productions http://www.imdb.com/name/nm1109688/ 

What We Need & What You Get

You will be a part of making a new original film and we have great rewards. 

  • The film will feature songs of new artists who want to be heard.   So send us your music and it may be included in the final cut. 
  • Send us a picture of your original sketch for one of the characters and we'll post it on "Out of State:A Gothic Romance" website. 
  • Having one location will keep production costs down.  My house is like a giant prop and wardrobe house, so we need very little to cover those normally big expenses.  But we need extra props
  • "Out of State"  features 4 main characters.  Besides their rate we need to cover travel expenses for the out of state actors - really -  one is coming in from LA, another from Colorado, one from Massachusetts.   Extras will feature family, friends and major contributors to the crowd funding campaign.
  • We have a very small crew  to capture picture and sound.  But shooting over 2 to 3 weeks more is considerable.  We have Tab's big recital scene at the end of filming of this is multi-camera and full crew of totally 10 and a dozen extras.  
  • Feeding a hungry team means that Craft Service and Expendables.  Having a full kitchen on location is a God send.  
  • Editing, sound, color correction and music even with everyone working at reduced rates adds up very fast.  Yet, this is where the film is made.
The Impact
I believe in great storytelling and creating theater, film and visuals with emotional impact is my life's goal.  "Out of State - A Gothic Romance" is about young love that is threatened by parental control run amuck. The film has universal appeal and will resonate with young adults 16+.  
I write from experience.  Like Elsa, I fell in love for the first time while living with a family in Argentina.  As a foreign exchange student I was forbidden to continue my love affair and faced threats of being sent away to the north country or deported.  It was a heartbreaking experience and I didn't understand how loving someone could be so wrong.  
Risks & Challenge

Film, video and theater are collaborative art forms.  From working in theater I've developed a talent for storytelling, character development and dialogue.  As a director I give actors tremendous space to practice their craft.   "Out of State A Gothic Romance" is my debut feature film.  

While working with Bill Marpet, Director, and Andy Biskin, Producer, at B Productions of New York for 15 years, I produced countless videos for our fashion, beauty and entertainment clients.  This includes  Starz TV Special "Murphy Brown - The 25th Anniversary Reunion," CBS "The Making of Fashion's Night Out" mega runway show at Lincoln Center, Conde Nast's "Wedding March on Madison," Mercedes Benz "New York Fashion Week,"GQ's "Mens Trends Video Wall in Las Vegas," and shot a documentary "Crobar - The Making of a MegaClub," with "Out of State A Gothic Romance" producer Cherie Fortis.

  Other Ways You Can Help

  • Please support the making of "Out of State - A Gothic Romance" any way you can.  You can share the link on social using Indiegogo shared tools.  
  • If you are a local eatery you can contribute to our craft services.  We'll credit you in the film and promote you on Facebook and Twitter.
  • Volunteer to write a press release or support our social media campaign on Facebook, Twitter, Instagram. 
  • Offer to house an out of town actor or crew member.
  • Send us an original song and we may consider it to use in the movie.
  • Send us your vision of what one of the character's should wear and we'll post it on "Out of State:A Gothic Romance" website.
story_txt:
Short Summary
Only 6 days left to contribute to Out of State A Gothic Romance Campaign.
I'm Victoria Bugbee, director, writer and producer of the new feature film "Out of State - A Gothic Romance."  Think "Rebecca" meets "The Royal Tenebaums" dark with a dash of humor.  We have shot over 60% of the film and we are thrilled with it.  The cast is fantastic and is nailing every scene.   We need your support to continue and finish production.  We have the big scenes left that require crewing up for two cameras, lots of extras and many days of production.  Then there is post production.  Whatever you contribute is greatly appreciated and we'll support your future projects.
 Here is a link to the trailer: https://vimeo.com/165040616
Here is a link to music video written by Joe Deihl and me.  Singer is Aimee Becker.  https://vimeo.com/138271583

story:
Short Summary

Monette, a traveling book salesman, spends countless days away on the road while his wife Barbara has found comfort in the arms of Cowboy Bob.  One night, Monette picks up a Deaf/Mute from the side of the road and  pours his heart out to the stranger, unaware that pouring one's heart out may lead to murder.


What We Need & What You Get

We need help to finish this film and this is where you come in. It takes more than just shooting a film to create one. Help us out by supporting our post-production and you will receive exciting perks for your donation. 
 
WHAT ELSE DO YOU GET???? 

 You get an all star cast of wonderful talented Chicago based actors! Click on their names to check out their IMDB Page.


Phillip Edward Van Lear is an accomplished Television/Film and Theatre Actor. Phillip is best known for his heavily recurring roles in FOX’S PRISON BREAK (21 Episodes), FOX’S CHICAGO CODE (7 Episodes) and STARZ’S BOSS (4 Episodes). Other television credits includes LEVERAGE, TURKS, EARLY EDITION and THE BEAST. His film credits include a supporting role in TYLER PERRY’S MEET THE BROWN. Other film credits include BARBERSHOP 2, THE EXPRESS and he just wrapped THE UNDERGROUND RAILROAD.


Melissa Walker is a rising stage and screen actress based in Chicago, Illinois. She has a Bachelor of Arts in Dance from The University of Nevada Las Vegas, with workshops including Scott David at The Actors Key in Burbank, California, and Claire Simon at The Vagabond School of the Arts in Chicago.

Her film credits include The Origin of Wit and Humor, directed by Christian Gridelli & Hunter Norris, and Paracosm, a silent conceptual film directed by Wade Balsamo. 


Harold Dennis currently has 107 (IMDb) Internet Movie Database credits and is filming 7 projects with 17 films in post production.  Harold has 171 performances in the Hit Blues play "I Was There When the Blues Was Red Hot".  

He was selected as one of Rolling Out Magazine's Chicago's Most Wanted Men of Substance and Style and nominated BEST ACTOR by the African American Arts Alliance for the film "Englewood"




Thomas A Jackson's screen acting debut  was in his 2007 award winning short "One-Track Mind" and he has appeared in more than a dozen films and television series including TNT's Leverage.  His film credits include Spades, Drifted, We Had This Band and the forthcoming Fangs vs. Spurs.

 

North Roberts is an actor and producer, known for Bled White (2009), Welcome to Dreadville IV: Love, Death and Blueberry Pancakes (2009) and The Disappeared (2014). 


The Impact

Your donation will help us bring a Stephen King story to a larger audience.  This will be done by submitting Mute to film festivals.

Creating any film comes with challenges, especially during the post-production process.  Collaborating creativity and achieving the best version of our goal are some of the challenges of post-production-we intend to traverse these, as well as, to create the most cohesive, compelling, and exciting story we can.   This includes an amazing sound score and top of the line editing. 



Other Ways You Can Help

We understand in this day and age everyone’s budget is tight and that everyone is looking for a donation for their next big film.  Every little bit helps but if you can’t donate please spread the word by visiting our Facebook Page, our Mute Movie Page, and our IMDB.  All the help is appreciated!

story:
Our names are Itzhak and Shira Fuchs, and we live in Israel.

We have 3 kids: Ethan who is 9 years old, Shmuel who is 8 years old, and our little gorgeous girl who was born after our two precious boys. Her name is Hannah (we named her after her grandmother) and she's 5 years old.

Hannah is an adorable little girl, and everyone who got to know her simply fell in love with her.

Just a couple of weeks ago, Hannah was diagnosed with Leukemia (acute lymphoblastic leukemia - ALL), after she's been feeling bad for a while, and went through medical checks.  

Our natural reaction was to simply fall apart. But we understood that the only acceptable approach was to get ourselves together, and realize that we have to go through this tough, cruel battle with the terrible disease in order to save our precious angel. 

In addition, Hannah suffers from a pretty severe infection as a result of her illness, and the Doctors have to cure it before they can proceed and treat her cancer. She suffers terrible pain, and it's so hard for us to see our little angel like this.

The hardest days are the ones in which Hannah is connected to tubes, and we aren't able to kiss her, and not even to touch her. These moments are too hard to describe in words. 

The problem is that the insurance will not cover all medical expenses and Hannah's other needs throughout her treatment , and we're talking about very high expenses. In addition, Hannah's medical treatment and recovery period will probably take at least 3 years, and maybe even more. Both of us already work less time because of Hannah's treatment and earn less as a result, and it's very likely that Shira will have to give up her job so that she can fully dedicate herself to Hannah's battle.

We've never asked for donations before in our lives, and it is very hard for us to do so.  Yet we don't have any other choice, as the medical expenses are enormous, while our incomes are lower as a result of the situation, and we will also be facing significant child care expenses for our two other children, as a result of our absence from home.

And this situation is going to last for at least 3 years.

Any donation of any amount you can make will be a blessing, and will be used to save Hannah.

story:
Zagare Fringe Festival; ZFF

Where? Zagare, 2015 Lithuanian Capital of Culture; 
5 mins walk from Latvia / 1 hr 30 from Riga / 3 hrs from Vilnius
Why?  Because some things deserve a chance. Have you ever had that feeling or adrenalin that keeps you going despite not knowing where the idea is leading you, and with no set idea of what the results will be...but you just know it's going to lead to something positive?

When? 4th – 10th May 2015

How?  With vision, enthusiasm, spirit & energy

As a brief background, in no particular order;

•ZFF is being coordinated by a small group of volunteers who are passionate about Zagare.

• Our main aim is to create an event that inspires us, in the hope others will feel inspired too.

• ZFF will be an environment for artists from Lithuania and abroad to come together and interact, be creative, inspire, and perform / exhibit in various venues in Zagare.

•There are a great number of Fringe Festivals that happen all over the UK, Europe and across the world, and we want to introduce the spirit of Fringe Festivals to Lithuania.

• Zagare is a unique town, with an artistic soul, and has the feel of ‘time stood still’.

• There are many interesting venues, ranging from a derelict dairy or an old bath house, to a 19th Century palace, and anything in between.

• If you want to take a chance on supporting something memorable and being a part of its development and success, then we promise to deliver.

• Zagare isn’t near a motorway, nor a railway line. Zagare is in a regional park with an island feel.  Those who visit, intend to.  Those who visit, return. (except those who visit for the first time on a damp November day..) It has a declining and ageing population. It used to have a large Jewish population.  It has the 2nd highest Roma community in Lithuania. It has high unemployment and more and more unoccupied homes. It's population was 14,000 at the turn of the 20th Century…now it is less than 2,000.

• But...

• It has history, lots of it. It's old, older than Riga. It has charm, it has intrigue, it has fast internet, it now even has running water available for all homes, and it has the potential to leave an impression on you…

• I first came to Zagare 10 years ago, and I now call it my home, and I’m proud to do that. 

• Who are the artists who will be involved? Performance artists, film makers, installation artists, musicians, street artists, theatre groups, photographers..perhaps even you? 
http://zagarefringe.weebly.com/programme--programa.html

• What have we asked participants to do? Interact with the local community, especially the young people, and the Roma community. Create work together, inspire them, and build their confidence to believe…

• Please share this far and wide… 

What We Need

  • We need people with the faith to believe in our vision. 
  • We also need the resources to make it happen; we have dreams of a theatre group coming from Poland, a Finnish/Korean dance due from Germany, a film maker from London, and many more...All of these artists have reserved the time in their diaries, but we need to fund their travel, living and material costs.
  • Every single penny/cent raised will go directly to  making the biggest success possible out of the project. 

The "Something in Return"

  • Aside from the warm fuzzy feeling, we're offering a number of lovely perks to those of you who kindly support us... look right and up to read about them ->

And what makes us think we can achieve this?

Because we did it before... 10 years ago...and now it's time again...

10 years ago we founded the annual Zagare Cherry Festival, which in its first year attracted 4,000 people over the weekend and last year an astonishing 40,000 people. When you remember the population of Zagare is just over 1,500, you can believe we made an impact... 

It's not just financial help we need

  • Spreading the word is equally important, we're still keen to hear from anyone who may like to come and take part... after all, what's more satisfying than saying "I was there at the first one...I was there when it all began..."

.

• Our main aim is to create an event that inspires us, in the hope others will feel inspired too.
• ZFF will be an environment for artists from Lithuania and abroad to come together and interact, be creative, inspire, and perform / exhibit in various venues in Zagare.
•There are a great number of Fringe Festivals that happen all over the UK, Europe and across the world, and we want to introduce the spirit of Fringe Festivals to Lithuania.
• Zagare is a unique town, with an artistic soul, and has the feel of ‘time stood still’.
• There are many interesting venues, ranging from a derelict dairy or an old bath house, to a 19th Century palace, and anything in between.
• If you want to take a chance on supporting something memorable and being a part of its development and success, then we promise to deliver.
• Zagare isn’t near a motorway, nor a railway line. Zagare is in a regional park with an island feel.  Those who visit, intend to.  Those who visit, return. (except those who visit for the first time on a damp November day..) It has a declining and ageing population. It used to have a large Jewish population.  It has the 2nd highest Roma community in Lithuania. It has high unemployment and more and more unoccupied homes. It's population was 14,000 at the turn of the 20th Century…now it is less than 2,000.
• But...
• It has history, lots of it. It's old, older than Riga. It has charm, it has intrigue, it has fast internet, it now even has running water available for all homes, and it has the potential to leave an impression on you…
• I first came to Zagare 10 years ago, and I now call it my home, and I’m proud to do that. 
• Who are the artists who will be involved? Performance artists, film makers, installation artists, musicians, street artists, theatre groups, photographers..perhaps even you? http://zagarefringe.weebly.com/programme--programa.html
• What have we asked participants to do? Interact with the local community, especially the young people, and the Roma community. Create work together, inspire them, and build their confidence to believe…
• Please share this far and wide… 

What We Need

We need people with the faith to believe in our vision. 
We also need the resources to make it happen; we have dreams of a theatre group coming from Poland, a Finnish/Korean dance due from Germany, a film maker from London, and many more...All of these artists have reserved the time in their diaries, but we need to fund their travel, living and material costs.
Every single penny/cent raised will go directly to  making the biggest success possible out of the project. 


The "Something in Return"

Aside from the warm fuzzy feeling, we're offering a number of lovely perks to those of you who kindly support us... look right and up to read about them ->




And what makes us think we can achieve this?
Because we did it before... 10 years ago...and now it's time again...
10 years ago we founded the annual Zagare Cherry Festival, which in its first year attracted 4,000 people over the weekend and last year an astonishing 40,000 people. When you remember the population of Zagare is just over 1,500, you can believe we made an impact... 

It's not just financial help we need
Spreading the word is equally important, we're still keen to hear from anyone who may like to come and take part... after all, what's more satisfying than saying "I was there at the first one...I was there when it all began..."


.

story:
The Caribbean receives the most tourism traffic in the world and nearly 50% of all cruise tourism. Tourism is the world’s largest service industry and the main source of income for many developing countries with limited resources, including the islands of the Caribbean. However, large-scale tourism damages the environment, depletes valuable limited resources, and tourist dollars end up in the hands of foreign hoteliers and companies — instead of supporting the host country’s economy. 

Not all tourism is like this! The Center for Responsible Travel (CREST) is partnering with filmmaker Esther Figueroa, Ph.D., to create a documentary that features creative, successful approaches to coastal tourism in the Caribbean. These approaches demonstrate sustainable tourism practices by pursuing:

  • Environmental stewardship
  • Energy conservation
  • Climate change adaptation
  • Community engagement
  • Support to local industries and businesses
  • Cultural enhancement
  • Good working conditions
  • Opportunities for visitors to learn, grow and give back

"Innovating the Caribbean" will feature several businesses from four Caribbean islands that are leading the movement toward sustainable tourism. Rather than constructing unsustainable resorts, these island escapes are built in ways that are more integrated with and beneficial to local communities and the native landscape.

Bucuti & Tara Beach Resort uses renewable energy, recycles and reduces waste, and is made with a low impact design. The efficiency of this hotel contributes to Aruba Prime Minister Mike Eman’s clean energy policy, which aims to make the country carbon neutral by 2020. The island is dotted with windmills and solar panels as Aruba charts a course to become the world’s first sustainable country.

The hotels we will feature in Grenada, including True Blue Bay Resort (pictured) and Calabash Grenada Hotel, have demonstrated their commitment to sustainability by utilizing local agriculture, reporting energy conservation successes, and positively integrating the businesses with the surrounding community. The Grenada Underwater Sculpture Park, the first of its kind in the world, features marine conservation. The government’s latest tourism program, Pure Grenada, supports these and more sustainable tourism ventures.

Great Huts in Portland and Jamnesia in St. Thomas offer small-scale, community-rich visitor experiences. Island Outpost (pictured) immerses tourists in the community through a travelers’ philanthropy program and locally produced food, herbs and oils for the kitchens and spa. Round Hill Hotel and Villas is committed to benefitting the community and provides excellent working conditions for its employees, including their own organic garden.

Puntacana Resort & Club is one of the oldest eco-resorts in the Caribbean. The resort founded the Puntacana Ecological Foundation and Puntacana Foundation to protect and restore the natural resources of the region; to provide jobs, educational opportunities and healthy livelihoods for the local community; and to promote the vibrant cultural past and present of the Dominican Republic. The resort implements coral restoration initiatives and sustainable golf course design, and has also built one of the Caribbean's first "green" airports.

To date, there has been no independent documentary about positive innovations and trends in coastal tourism. This film is a critical step toward building “tourism literacy,” public understanding about the environmental and economic damages experienced by host countries from large-scale, conventional tourism. With this film, we can educate travelers about eco-friendly vacation alternatives that give back to local communities.

Our goal is to have the film finished and ready by July 2015 for the USA premiere in Washington, DC. We want to use the film as an education tool for the industry and see an expansion of tourism businesses that are environmentally, socially and economically sustainable. Most importantly, we want to increase public awareness of sustainable tourism practices and inform travelers that your vacation can leave a positive effect on your destination.
